title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Remote Laboratory-Based Electrical Engineering Foundation Practical Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design basic series/parallel circuits using electrical circuit components.
Learners can measure voltage/current values and analyze data via a remote laboratory (RL) interface.
Learners can collaborate with team members to complete a simple electrical project (LED circuit design) and document results in a report.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
